title: Czech Republic: Citibank Receives MasterCard Award for Citi Opuscard, the First Multifunctional Credit Card
summary: Prague - Citibank Europe plc has received the MasterCard® Multifunctional Card Award for 2012. The award recognizes Citi Opuscard, which was launched in cooperation with the Liberec Region last autumn. The Citi Opuscard is the first multifunctional credit card of its kind in the Czech Republic and combines the advantages of the Citi Life credit card with the regional multifunctional Opuscard, which has mainly been used in public transport to date. With a single card, customers can use public transport in the Liberec Region and make everyday payments in shops in the Czech Republic and all over the world, as well as over the internet, and make cash withdrawals from ATMs.
tag-1: Czech Republic: Citibank Receives MasterCard Award for Citi Opuscard, the First Multifunctional Credit Card
tag-2: Prague – Citibank Europe plc has received the MasterCard® Multifunctional Card Award for 2012. The award recognizes Citi Opuscard, which was launched in cooperation with the Liberec Region last autumn. The Citi Opuscard is the first multifunctional credit card of its kind in the Czech Republic and combines the advantages of the Citi Life credit card with the regional multifunctional Opuscard, which has mainly been used in public transport to date. With a single card, customers can use public transport in the Liberec Region and make everyday payments in shops in the Czech Republic and all over the world, as well as over the internet, and make cash withdrawals from ATMs.
tag-3: "Citibank is the first bank in the Czech Republic to enable clients to enjoy the benefits of both a credit card and a multifunctional card in public transport. We very much appreciate the award and market recognition that we have received from MasterCard," said Veronika Španárová, Retail Bank Head at Citibank.
tag-4: The Citi Opuscard credit card offers its holders the ability to spread out the charge for an annual pass valued at a minimum of CZK 4,000 and applicable in the IDOL Integrated Public Transport Fare over 12 monthly installments free of charge, without any mark-up and with a zero annual interest rate. All Citi Opuscard holders can receive benefits and discounts of up to 25 percent on goods and services purchased from partners of the Citi Club program, and the BENEFIT loyalty scheme will still be valid for Opuscard holders. Discounts under the Citi Club program are directly deducted from the total amount that is paid to service providers or goods retailers. Citibank cooperates with more than 300 retailers and service providers in the Citi Club loyalty scheme. Citi Opuscard holders can therefore receive bargain discounts at more than 900 locations throughout the Czech Republic – at many restaurants, furniture and sporting goods vendors and in popular brand name clothing stores. They can also enjoy discounts when visiting fitness centers or booking holidays.
tag-5: As with all other Citi credit cards, the new Citi Opuscard also offers an up to 55-day interest-free period, or the option of selecting your own PIN free of charge. Citi Opuscard clients can also receive up to four additional cards free of charge. These cards also include the possibility to be refunded 2 percent of the value of each purchase paid using the credit card, and to take advantage of the discounts under the Citi Club program.
tag-6: More information about Citi Opuscard is available by visiting www.citikarta.cz, calling the CitiPhone customer line – 233 062 222 – or visiting the Opuscard Client Center in Liberec.
